group.name: Grounding in Brussels- Meditation for All

description:
Let us get together! 

If it is a sunshiny day then we will have a barefoot park meditation circle. Otherwise, we will meet at my home- close to Bourse. 

We will begin with a bit of discussion about what each is practicing, then we will practice- whether I guide a meditation or we all practice within our own comforts. After practice, we will be able to have a bit of time to discuss our group experience.

Looking forward to connecting :)
how_to_find_us: To be determined by Mother Nature- either at Parc Royal or chez moi
name: Grounding with sunshine!

group.name: Grounding in Brussels- Meditation for All

description:
It is sure to be a sunny Sunday! 

Let us meet up for a grounding circle in the park. 

Please bring something to sit on and an open heart. 

See you there :)
how_to_find_us: Meet at the entrance of Av. Victor Rousseau & Av. Maréchal Joffre
name: Sunny Grounding Circle!
